actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to increase the contribution by the Federal Government to the costs of employees' health benefits insurance.

summary.text: Increases the contribution of the Government to Federal employees' health insurance to 75 percent.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to increase the contribution by the Federal Government to the costs of employees' health benefits insurance.
